name: expge0d
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

|- wi(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, cexp, c1)))

comment: Nonnegative integer exponentiation with a nonnegative mantissa is nonnegative. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)
